page.title: 08 People's Jobs,West Stafford
page.content:
We interviewed 72 people at Highfield Grove Middle School about their parent's jobs.We asked them if their parents had a job,what sort,and if they had more than one job. We found that in 63.8% of families both Mum and Dad worked,in 1.3% only Mum worked,in 23.6% only Dad worked,in 11.1% both parents are unemployed and 16.6% of parents have more than one job.
-MUMS- The most popular job was as cleaners (about 15%),followed by working in a Bank,Cafe,Laundry,Shop and at G.E.C. (about 3% each). -DADS- The most popular jobs were as lorry drivers and working in a factory (about 10% each),followed by in an Office,on the Railway and as a Builder ( each about 3% ).
